song.title: In Meinem Komputer..
song.info:
From file sample information:
#Thunderstrike/StA# EsqKT88.SyntSnare RolandTR808/EsqKT88 RolandTR808/EsqKT88 Computer Noice RolandTR808/EsqKT88
SawPad.PhatBass.KT88 ResoFlange.DblBass.KT8 ResoFlange.Flux.KT88 ResoFlange.Seq1.KT88 ResoFlange.Seq2.KT88 ResoFlange.Seq3.KT88 Resonating
VCFSawForm.ResoLoop SawPad.Dim PhaseSaw.Feedback90 SinglePhasing.Feedback SawPad.MinDim SawPad.MinDim#2 Hyperlow SawPhase Arrested-Feedback SawPad.SingleTone.loop
ChoirPad.KT88
I'm so sorry 'bout the HUUUGE filesize.
1997 Thunderstrike
Kraftwerk.Snare Kraftwerk.SmatterHat
Mostly sinesaw wave- forms used to create these samples (xept smp 1Bthe drums). #Thunderstrike/ Statikk Art If you rip without giving me credit i'll kill you (almost...) O'yeah: Inspired by Kraftwerk (really...?) and somewhat by Depeche Mode (their music from the 80:ies)
1997 Thunderstrike Lyrics: In my computer, information will be free, at last. In meinem Komputer, Information wird frei sein.
